ygData.subject: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: I know this is a little ahead of the game already... but does anyone know about the Paladin sword Fiery Avenger ? I heard you have to kill a guy who s name
ygData.messageBody:
I know this is a little ahead of the game already... but does anyone
know about the Paladin sword 'Fiery Avenger'? I heard you have to kill
a guy who's name Brad McQuaid... lvl 52 or something.... but where is
this guy... what should by group composition be.. and what are the
stats of the sword... 'Tis a little early but I am looking for better
weapon.


Kalvarin
Erollisi Marr
Paladin of Karana

&
also known as
Tanuvanu
Erollisi Marr
Ranger of Tunare
